abstract: Oil India, a state-owned explorer, hired seven banks including Citigroup and Morgan Stanley to help complete an overseas acquisition as it seeks to boost India’s energy security.
snippet: Oil India, a state-owned explorer, hired seven banks including Citigroup and Morgan Stanley to help complete an overseas acquisition as it seeks to boost India’s energy security.
lead_paragraph: Oil India, a state-owned explorer, hired seven banks including Citigroup and Morgan Stanley to help complete an overseas acquisition this fiscal year as it seeks to increase the country’s energy security.

headline.main: Oil India Enlists Banks to Identify Foreign Targets
